AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqAIX71GE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for AIX71: Checks whether AIX version is greater than or equal to 7.1.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.1 and AIX7.1-3.1.1 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of characters that were present in the previous password that cannot be used in the new password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.2 and AIX7.1-3.1.2 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 1 week, before a password can be changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.3 and AIX7.1-3.1.3 (Level 1): Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.4 and AIX7.1-3.1.4 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum length of a password to 8 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.5 and AIX7.1-3.1.5 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.6 and AIX7.1-3.1.6 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.7 and AIX7.1-3.1.7 (Level 1): Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.8 and AIX7.1-3.1.8 (Level 1): Specifies the number of weeks before a password can be reused to 13.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.9 and AIX7.1-3.1.9 (Level 1): Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse to 20.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.10 and AIX7.1-3.1.10 (Level 1): Specifies the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password to 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minloweralpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-3.1.11 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of lowercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minupperalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-3.1.12 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of uppercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-3.1.13 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of digits in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-3.1.14 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of special characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_pwdalgorithm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.1.11 and AIX7.1-3.1.15 (Level 1): Set the system password algorithm to a stronger cryptographic hash algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_logindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.1 (Level 2): Set local login (login) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rlogindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.1 (Level 2): Set remote login (rlogin) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.2 (Level 2): Set local login (login) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rloginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.2 (Level 2): Set remote login (rlogin) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.3 (Level 2): Set local login (login) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rloginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.3 (Level 2): Set remote login (rlogin) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.4 (Level 2): Set local login (login) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rloginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.4 (Level 2): Set remote login (rlogin) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginnobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.5 (Level 2): Set local login (login) for user nobody to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rloginnobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.5 (Level 2): Set remote login (rlogin) for user nobody to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.7 (Level 2): Set local login (login) for user lpd to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rloginlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.9 and AIX7.1-3.2.1.7 (Level 2): Set remote login (rlogin) for user lpd to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_logininterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.1 and AIX7.1-3.2.2 (Level 1): Specifies the time interval (300 seconds) for a port in which the unsuccessful login attempts must occur before the port is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.2 and AIX7.1-3.2.3 (Level 1): Specifies 10 as the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port before the port is locked.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.3 and AIX7.1-3.2.4 (Level 1): Specifies the time interval (360 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.4 and AIX7.1-3.2.5 (Level 1): Specifies the time interval (30 seconds) to type in a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.5 and AIX7.1-3.2.6 (Level 1): Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 10 seconds.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.6 and AIX7.1-3.2.7 (Level 1): Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 3, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.7 and AIX7.1-3.2.8 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user root to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rootsu
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.8 and AIX7.1-3.2.9 (Level 1): Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by setting su attribute to true.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rootsugroups
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.2.8 and AIX7.1-3.2.9 (Level 1): Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by setting sugroups attribute to system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disqdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.1 and AIX7.1-3.3.1 (Level 2): Disable qdaemon: Stops qdaemon and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.2 and AIX7.1-3.3.2 (Level 2): Disable lpd daemon: Stops lpd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dispiobe
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.3 and AIX7.1-3.3.3 (Level 2): Disable piobe daemon: Stops piobe daemon and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disdt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.4 and AIX7.1-3.3.4 (Level 2): Disable dt: Stops dt and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disrcnfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.5 and AIX7.1-3.3.5 (Level 2): Disable rcnfs: Stops rcnfs and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dissendmaildmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.6 and AIX7.1-3.3.6 (Level 2): Disable sendmail daemon: Stops sendmail daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.7 and AIX7.1-3.3.7 (Level 2): Disable snmp daemon: Stops snmp daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disdhcpcddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.8 and AIX7.1-3.3.8 (Level 2): Disable dhcpcd daemon: Stops dhcpcd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disdhcprddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.9 and AIX7.1-3.3.9 (Level 2): Disable dhcprd daemon: Stops dhcprd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disdhcpsddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.10 and AIX7.1-3.3.10 (Level 2): Disable dhcpsd daemon: Stops dhcpsd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disautoconf6dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.11 and AIX7.1-3.3.11 (Level 2): Disable autoconf6 daemon: Stops autoconf6 daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disgateddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.12 and AIX7.1-3.3.12 (Level 2): Disable gated daemon: Stops gated daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dismrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.13 and AIX7.1-3.3.13 (Level 2): Disable mrouted daemon: Stops mrouted daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disnameddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.14 and AIX7.1-3.3.14 (Level 2): Disable named daemon: Stops named daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.15 and AIX7.1-3.3.15 (Level 2): Disable routed daemon: Stops routed daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.16 and AIX7.1-3.3.16 (Level 2): Disable rwhod daemon: Stops rwhod daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_distimeddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.17 and AIX7.1-3.3.17 (Level 2): Disable timed daemon: Stops timed daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.18 and AIX7.1-3.3.18 (Level 2): Disable dpid2 daemon: Stops dpid2 daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dishostmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.19 and AIX7.1-3.3.19 (Level 2): Disable hostmibd daemon: Stops hostmibd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dissnmpmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.20 and AIX7.1-3.3.20 (Level 2): Disable snmpmibd daemon: Stops snmpmibd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disaixmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.21 and AIX7.1-3.3.21 (Level 2): Disable aixmibd daemon: Stops aixmibd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disndpdhostdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.22 and AIX7.1-3.3.22 (Level 2): Disable ndpd-host daemon: Stops ndpd-host daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disndpdrouterdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.23 and AIX7.1-3.3.23 (Level 2): Disable ndpd-router daemon: Stops ndpd-router daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.24 and AIX7.1-3.3.24 (Level 1): Disable telnet in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for telnet daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of telnetd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.25 and AIX7.1-3.3.25 (Level 1): Disable exec in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for exec daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexecd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.26 and AIX7.1-3.3.26 (Level 1): Disable TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.26 and AIX7.1-3.3.26 (Level 1): Disable UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.27 and AIX7.1-3.3.27 (Level 1): Disable shell in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for shell daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.28 and AIX7.1-3.3.28 (Level 2): Disable cmsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of cmsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.29 and AIX7.1-3.3.29 (Level 2): Disable ttdbserver in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ttdbserver.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.30 and AIX7.1-3.3.30 (Level 2): Disable uucp in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for uucp daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of uucpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.31 and AIX7.1-3.3.31 (Level 2): Disable TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of time(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.31 and AIX7.1-3.3.31 (Level 2): Disable UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of time(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.32 and AIX7.1-3.3.32 (Level 1): Disable login in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for login daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.33 and AIX7.1-3.3.33 (Level 2): Disable talk in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for talk daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ntalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.34 and AIX7.1-3.3.34 (Level 2): Disable ntalk in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ntalk daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ntalkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.35 and AIX7.1-3.3.35 (Level 1): Disable ftp in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ftp daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.36 and AIX7.1-3.3.36 (Level 1): Disable TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_udpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.36 and AIX7.1-3.3.36 (Level 1): Disable UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.37 and AIX7.1-3.3.37 (Level 1): Disable TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_udpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.37 and AIX7.1-3.3.37 (Level 1): Disable UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.38 and AIX7.1-3.3.38 (Level 2): Disable dtspc in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for dtspc daemon in /etc/inetd.conf when LFT is not configured and CDE is disabled in /etc/inittab, and kills all instances of dtspc daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.39 and AIX7.1-3.3.39 (Level 1): Disable TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.39 and AIX7.1-3.3.39 (Level 1): Disable UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.40 and AIX7.1-3.3.40 (Level 2): Disable pcnfsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pcnfsd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pcnfsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.41 and AIX7.1-3.3.41 (Level 2): Disable rstatd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rstatd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rstatd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rusersd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.42 and AIX7.1-3.3.42 (Level 2): Disable rusersd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rusersd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rusersd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.43 and AIX7.1-3.3.43 (Level 2): Disable rwalld in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rwalld daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rwalld.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.44 and AIX7.1-3.3.44 (Level 1): Disable sprayd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for sprayd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of sprayd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_krlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.45 and AIX7.1-3.3.45 (Level 2): Disable klogin in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for klogin daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of krlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_kshell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.46 and AIX7.1-3.3.46 (Level 2): Disable kshell in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for kshell daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of krshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.47 and AIX7.1-3.3.47 (Level 2): Disable rquotad in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rquotad daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rquotad.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.48 and AIX7.1-3.3.48 (Level 2): Disable tftp in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for tftp daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_imapd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.49 and AIX7.1-3.3.49 (Level 2): Disable imapd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for imapd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of imapd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_pop3d
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.50 and AIX7.1-3.3.50 (Level 2): Disable pop3d in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pop3d daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pop3d.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_fingerd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.51 and AIX7.1-3.3.51 (Level 1): Disable finger in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for finger daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of fingerd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_instsrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.52 and AIX7.1-3.3.52 (Level 2): Disable instsrv in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for instsrv daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of instsrv.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chperminetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.53 and AIX7.1-3.3.53 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/inetd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chowninetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.3.53 and AIX7.1-3.3.53 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:system for /etc/inetd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermrcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.4.1 and AIX7.1-3.4.1 (Level 2): Remove all permissions from the remote service command rcp.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.4.1 and AIX7.1-3.4.1 (Level 2): Remove all permissions from the remote service command rlogin.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermrsh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.4.1 and AIX7.1-3.4.1 (Level 2): Remove all permissions from the remote service command rsh.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermrlogind
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.4.2 and AIX7.1-3.4.2 (Level 2): Remove all permissions from the remote service daemon rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermrshd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.4.2 and AIX7.1-3.4.2 (Level 2): Remove all permissions from the remote service daemon rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermtftpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.4.2 and AIX7.1-3.4.2 (Level 2): Remove all permissions from the remote service daemon tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmrhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.5.1 and AIX7.1-3.5.1 (Level 2): Remove .rhosts and .netrc files for all users.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.5.2 and AIX7.1-3.5.2 (Level 2): Disable or comment out entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ipsrcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.1 and AIX7.1-3.6.1 (Level 2): Network option ipsrcrouteforward: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouteforward to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ipignoreredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.2 and AIX7.1-3.6.2 (Level 2): Network option ipignoreredirects: Set the value of the network option ipignoreredirects to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.3 and AIX7.1-3.6.3 (Level 2): Network option clean_partial_conns: Set the value of the network option clean_partial_conns to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ipsrcroutesend
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.4 and AIX7.1-3.6.4 (Level 2): Network option ipsrcroutesend: Set the value of the network option ipsrcroutesend to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ipforwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.5 and AIX7.1-3.6.5 (Level 2): Network option ipforwarding: Set the value of the network option ipforwarding to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ipsendredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.6 and AIX7.1-3.6.6 (Level 2): Network option ipsendredirects: Set the value of the network option ipsendredirects to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ip6srcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.7 and AIX7.1-3.6.7 (Level 2): Network option ip6srcrouteforward: Set the value of the network option ip6srcrouteforward to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_directed_broadcast
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.8 and AIX7.1-3.6.8 (Level 2): Network option directed_broadcast: Set the value of the network option directed_broadcast to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcp_pmtu_discover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.9 and AIX7.1-3.6.9 (Level 2): Network option tcp_pmtu_discover: Set the value of the network option tcp_pmtu_discover to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_bcastping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.10 and AIX7.1-3.6.10 (Level 2): Network option bcastping: Set the value of the network option bcastping to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_icmpaddressmask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.11 and AIX7.1-3.6.11 (Level 2): Network option icmpaddressmask: Set the value of the network option icmpaddressmask to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_udp_pmtu_discover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.12 and AIX7.1-3.6.12 (Level 2): Network option udp_pmtu_discover: Set the value of the network option udp_pmtu_discover to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ipsrcrouterecv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.13 and AIX7.1-3.6.13 (Level 2): Network option ipsrcrouterecv: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouterecv to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_nonlocsrcroute
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.14 and AIX7.1-3.6.14 (Level 2): Network option nonlocsrcroute: Set the value of the network option nonlocsrcroute to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.15 and AIX7.1-3.6.15 (Level 2): Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set the value of the network option tcp_tcpsecure to 7.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sockthresh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.16 and AIX7.1-3.6.16 (Level 2): Network option sockthresh: Set the value of the network option sockthresh to 60.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rfc1323
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.17 and AIX7.1-3.6.17 (Level 2): Network option rfc1323: Set the value of the network option rfc1323 to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcp_sendspace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.18 and AIX7.1-3.6.18 (Level 2): Network option tcp_sendspace: Set the value of the network option tcp_sendspace to 262144.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcp_recvspace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.19 and AIX7.1-3.6.19 (Level 2): Network option tcp_recvspace: Set the value of the network option tcp_recvspace to 262144.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_tcp_mssdflt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.20 and AIX7.1-3.6.20 (Level 2): Network option tcp_mssdflt: Set the value of the network option tcp_mssdflt to 1448.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_nfso_portcheck
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.21 and AIX7.1-3.6.21 (Level 2): Set the value of the Network File System (NFS) tuning parameter portcheck to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_nfso_nfs_use_reserved_ports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.6.21 and AIX7.1-3.6.21 (Level 2): Set the value of the Network File System (NFS) tuning parameter nfs_use_reserved_ports to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.1 and AIX7.1-3.7.1 (Level 2): Makes root the only user in cron.allow file and removes the cron.deny file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_atallowdeny
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.2 and AIX7.1-3.7.2 (Level 2): Makes root the only user in at.allow file and removes the at.deny file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.3 and AIX7.1-3.7.3 (Level 1): Adds root username in /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_loginherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.4 and AIX7.1-3.7.4 (Level 1): Adds a default herald to /etc/security/login.cfg.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmuserguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.5 and AIX7.1-3.7.5 (Level 1): Local Accounts: Remove user account guest.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rootcrnjobck
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.6 and AIX7.1-3.7.6 (Level 1): Make sure the permissions of all the root crontab entries are owned and writable by the root user only.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.7 and AIX7.1-3.7.7 (Level 2): Object creation permissions: Specifies default object creation permissions to 027.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_corelimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.8 and AIX7.1-3.7.8 (Level 2): Core Dumps: Set the core limit in the default stanza to 0 in /etc/security/limits.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_corehardlimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.8 and AIX7.1-3.7.8 (Level 2): Core Dumps: Set the core_hard limit in the default stanza to 0 in /etc/security/limits.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disfullcore
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.8 and AIX7.1-3.7.8 (Level 2): Core Dumps: Set the fullcore kernel parameter to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_binaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-1.7.9 and AIX7.1-3.7.9 (Level 2): Enables bin auditing.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_localsyslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.1.1 and AIX7.1-4.1.1 (Level 2): Implements a local syslog configuration. Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.1.2 and AIX7.1-4.1.2 (Level 2): Implements a remote syslog configuration.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disable_syslogd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.1.3 and AIX7.1-4.1.3 (Level 2): Disallow the local syslogd daemon from accepting messages from other hosts on the network.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_installopenssh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.1 and AIX7.1-4.2.1 (Level 2): Install OpenSSH libraries.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_installopenssl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.1 and AIX7.1-4.2.1 (Level 2): Install OpenSSL libraries.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_PermitRootLogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.2 and AIX7.1-4.2.2 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to disable direct root login.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_Protocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.3 and AIX7.1-4.2.3 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ssh_Protocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.4 and AIX7.1-4.2.4 (Level 1): The SSH client must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_IgnoreRhosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.6 and AIX7.1-4.2.6 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to ignore .rhosts and .shosts files.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_PermitEmptyPasswords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.7 and AIX7.1-4.2.7 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to not to authenticate users with a null password.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_HostbasedAuthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.8 and AIX7.1-4.2.8 (Level 2): The SSH daemon must be configured to disallow host-based authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_UsePrivilegeSeparation
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.9 and AIX7.1-4.2.9 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to use privilege separation.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_shosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.10 and AIX7.1-4.2.10 (Level 2): Remove any existing .shosts files from all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_etcshostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.11 and AIX7.1-4.2.11 (Level 2): Remove the /etc/shosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_LogLevel
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.12 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to log login and logout activity by setting LogLevel to INFO.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_MaxAuthTries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.13 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to permit a maximum of 4 authentication attempts per connection.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_ClientAliveInterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.14 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to not to send alive messages to clients.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_ClientAliveCountMax
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.14 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to permit a maximum of 300 client keep alive messages without answer before disconnecting the session.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_Ciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.15 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to use ciphers as described in RFC4344.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshd_PermitUserEnvironment
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.16 (Level 1): The SSH daemon must be configured to ignore user-provided environment variables.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_allowsshdconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.1-4.2.17 (Level 1): Limit access via SSH by setting at least one of the AllowUsers, AllowGroups, DenyUsers, or DenyGroups options.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsshdconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.10 and AIX7.1-4.2.18 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go= for /etc/ssh/sshd_config.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsshconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.2.11 and AIX7.1-4.2.19 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/ssh/ssh_config.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sendmail
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.3.1 and AIX7.1-4.3.1 (Level 1): Make sure the default sendmail greeting string does not include the sendmail version and other related information.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownsendmailcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.3.2 and AIX7.1-4.3.2 (Level 1): Set the ownership root for /etc/mail/sendmail.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsendmailcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.3.2 and AIX7.1-4.3.2 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for /etc/mail/sendmail.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.3.3 and AIX7.1-4.3.3 (Level 1): Set the ownership root for /var/spool/mqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.3.3 and AIX7.1-4.3.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,go= for /var/spool/mqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstallCDE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.1 and AIX7.1-4.4.1 (Level 2): Make sure the CDE is uninstalled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disabledt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.2 and AIX7.1-4.4.2 (Level 2): Disable dt: Stops dt and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermdtaction
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.3 and AIX7.1-4.4.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions ug-s for /usr/dt/bin/dtaction.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermdtappgather
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.3 and AIX7.1-4.4.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions ug-s for /usr/dt/bin/dtappgather.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermdtprintinfo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.3 and AIX7.1-4.4.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions ug-s for /usr/dt/bin/dtprintinfo.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermdtsession
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.3 and AIX7.1-4.4.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions ug-s for /usr/dt/bin/dtsession.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownXconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.6 and AIX7.1-4.4.7 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:bin for /etc/dt/config/Xconfig.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermXconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.6 and AIX7.1-4.4.7 (Level 1): Set the permissions go-w for /etc/dt/config/Xconfig.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownXservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.7 and AIX7.1-4.4.8 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:bin for /etc/dt/config/Xservers.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermXservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.7 and AIX7.1-4.4.8 (Level 1): Set the permissions go-w for /etc/dt/config/Xservers.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownXresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.9 and AIX7.1-4.4.9 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:sys for /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermcdeXresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.4.9 and AIX7.1-4.4.9 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstallNFSclient
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.1 and AIX7.1-4.5.1 (Level 2): Make sure the NFS client is uninstalled if the server does not remotely mount NFS shares.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstallNFSserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.1 and AIX7.1-4.5.2 (Level 2): Make sure the NFS server is uninstalled if the server does not act as an NFS server to remote clients.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disableNFSsuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.2 and AIX7.1-4.5.3 (Level 1): Disable suid/sgid program execution within any mounted NFS filesystem.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disableNFSlocal
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.3 and AIX7.1-4.5.4 (Level 1): Remove any reference to localhost or localhost aliases from /etc/exports.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_restrictNFSaccess
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.4 and AIX7.1-4.5.5 (Level 2): Make sure the NFS exported filesystems and directories have defined host access.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rootsquashNFS
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.5 and AIX7.1-4.5.6 (Level 1): Set the root_squash to -2 or -1 for all NFS exports.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_secureNFS
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.5.6 and AIX7.1-4.5.7 (Level 2): Make sure the secure option is selected for all NFS exports.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstallNISclient
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.6.1 and AIX7.1-4.6.1 (Level 2): Make sure the NIS client is disabled and uninstalled if it is not used in the environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstallNISserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.6.2 and AIX7.1-4.6.2 (Level 2): Make sure the NIS server is disabled and uninstalled if it is not used in the environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_snmpgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.6.3 and AIX7.1-4.6.3 (Level 2): Remove the + (plus) markers from /etc/group file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_snmppasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.6.3 and AIX7.1-4.6.3 (Level 2): Remove the + (plus) markers from /etc/passwd file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_nissubnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.6.4 and AIX7.1-4.6.4 (Level 2): Limit access to the NIS data to specific subnets if NIS must be used in the environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chsnmp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.7.1 and AIX7.1-4.7.1 (Level 2): Disable the private community string in /etc/snmpd.conf. Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.7.2 and AIX7.1-4.7.2 (Level 2): Disable the system community string in /etc/snmpd.conf. Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.7.3 and AIX7.1-4.7.3 (Level 2): Disable the public community string in /etc/snmpd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_inetddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.8.1 and AIX7.1-4.8.1 (Level 2): Disable the inetd daemon, if all of the services run and managed by itself are disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_prtmapdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.9.1 and AIX7.1-4.9.1 (Level 2): Disable the portmap daemon, if all RPC services are disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_installTCPWrappers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.10.1 and AIX7.1-4.10.1 (Level 2): Make sure TCP Wrappers is installed and configured if there are active inetd controlled services on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chetchostsallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.10.2 and AIX7.1-4.10.2 (Level 1): Create and configure /etc/hosts.allow file if TCP Wrappers are installed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chetchostsdeny
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.10.3 and AIX7.1-4.10.3 (Level 1): Create and configure /etc/hosts.deny file if TCP Wrappers are installed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_inetdtcpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.10.4 and AIX7.1-4.10.4 (Level 2): Make sure the inetd services utilize the TCP Wrappers to restrict host access.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownsecurity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.1 and AIX7.1-4.11.1 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:security for /etc/security.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsecurity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.1 and AIX7.1-4.11.1 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for /etc/security.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chowngroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.2 and AIX7.1-4.11.2 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:security for /etc/group.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.2 and AIX7.1-4.11.2 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/group.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.3 and AIX7.1-4.11.3 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:security for /etc/passwd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.3 and AIX7.1-4.11.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/passwd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.4 and AIX7.1-4.11.4 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:audit for all /etc/security/audit directory tree objects.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.4 and AIX7.1-4.11.4 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for/etc/security/audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsecurityauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.4 and AIX7.1-4.11.4 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /etc/security/audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.5 and AIX7.1-4.11.5 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:audit for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.5 and AIX7.1-4.11.5 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.5 and AIX7.1-4.11.5 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsmitlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.6 and AIX7.1-4.11.6 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /smit.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermcronlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.7 and AIX7.1-4.11.7 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/adm/cron/log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermcrontabsdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.8 and AIX7.1-4.11.8 (Level 1): Set the permissions o= for the children objects of /var/spool/cron/crontabs recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chowncrontabs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.8 and AIX7.1-4.11.8 (Level 1): Set the group cron for all /var/spool/cron/crontabs directory tree objects.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermcrontabs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.8 and AIX7.1-4.11.8 (Level 1): Set the permissions ug=rwx,o= for /var/spool/cron/crontabs.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownatallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.9 and AIX7.1-4.11.9 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:sys for /var/adm/cron/at.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermatallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.9 and AIX7.1-4.11.9 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=r,go= for /var/adm/cron/at.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chowncronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.10 and AIX7.1-4.11.10 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:sys for /var/adm/cron/cron.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermcronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.10 and AIX7.1-4.11.10 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=r,go= for /var/adm/cron/cron.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.11 and AIX7.1-4.11.11 (Level 1): Set the ownership bin:bin for /etc/motd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.11 and AIX7.1-4.11.11 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/motd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermvaradmrasdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.12 and AIX7.1-4.11.12 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/adm/ras/*.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermRMstartlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.13 and AIX7.1-4.11.13 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/ct/RMstart.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermdpid2log
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.14 and AIX7.1-4.11.14 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/dpid2.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermhostmibdlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.15 and AIX7.1-4.11.15 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/hostmibd.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermsnmpdlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.16 and AIX7.1-4.11.16 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/snmpd.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chownadmsa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.17 and AIX7.1-4.11.17 (Level 1): Set the ownership adm:adm for /var/adm/sa.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermadmsa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.17 and AIX7.1-4.11.17 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,go=rx for /var/adm/sa.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermhomeconf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.18 and AIX7.1-4.11.18 (Level 1): Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all user configuration files in each home directory, e.g. .profile.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermhome
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.19 and AIX7.1-4.11.19 (Level 1): Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermpath
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.11.20 and AIX7.1-4.11.20 (Level 1): Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all the directories in root user PATH environment variable.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ttylogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.1 and AIX7.1-4.12.1 (Level 2): Disable the login capability of all connected tty devices.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disi4ls
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.2 and AIX7.1-4.12.2 (Level 2): Disable i4ls: Stops i4ls and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disrcncs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.3 and AIX7.1-4.12.3 (Level 2): Disable NCS: Stops NCS and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dishttpdlite
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.4 and AIX7.1-4.12.4 (Level 2): Disable httpdlite: Stops httpdlite and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_dispmd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.5 and AIX7.1-4.12.5 (Level 2): Disable pmd: Stops pmd and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_diswritesrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.6 and AIX7.1-4.12.6 (Level 2): Disable writesrv: Stops writesrv and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_blocktalksrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.7 and AIX7.1-4.12.7 (Level 2): Block attempts to use the talk and write command.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_blockwritesrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.7 and AIX7.1-4.12.7 (Level 2): Block attempts to use the talk and write command.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uidftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.9 and AIX7.1-4.12.9 (Level 2): Add all users with a UID less than 200 to /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chpermftpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.10 and AIX7.1-4.12.10 (Level 1): Set the umask of ftp service to 027 in order to prevent the FTP daemon process from creating world-writable files by default.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_ftpbanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.11 and AIX7.1-4.12.11 (Level 1): Set an ftp login banner which displays the acceptable usage policy.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chketcmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.12 and AIX7.1-4.12.12 (Level 1): Create a /etc/motd file which displays, post initial logon, a statutory warning message.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_limitcissysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.13 and AIX7.1-4.12.13 (Level 1): Review the current at files and add any relevant users to the /var/adm/cron/at.allow file. Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.14 and AIX7.1-4.12.14 (Level 1): Review the current cron files and add any relevant users to the /var/adm/cron/cron.allow file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_chkpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.15 and AIX7.1-4.12.15 (Level 1): Ensure all unlocked accounts on the server have a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_checkuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.16 and AIX7.1-4.12.16 (Level 1): Ensure all users have a unique UID on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_checkgid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.17 and AIX7.1-4.12.17 (Level 1): Ensure all groups have a unique GID on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmuseruucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.18 and AIX7.1-4.12.18 (Level 1): Local Accounts: Remove user account uucp.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmusernuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.18 and AIX7.1-4.12.18 (Level 1): Local Accounts: Remove user account nuucp.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmuserlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.18 and AIX7.1-4.12.18 (Level 1): Local Accounts: Remove user account lpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmuserprintq
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.18 and AIX7.1-4.12.18 (Level 1): Local Accounts: Remove user account printq.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.19 and AIX7.1-4.12.19 (Level 1): Removes the dot from the PATH environment variable in files .profile, .kshrc, .cshrc, and .login in the root home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmdotfrmpathetcenv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.20 and AIX7.1-4.12.20 (Level 1): Removes the dot from the PATH variable in /etc/environment file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_installclicrte
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.14.1 and AIX7.1-4.13.1 (Level 2): Utilize EFS, if there is a requirement for file based encryption.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sudo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.13.1 and AIX7.1-4.14.1 (Level 2): Install and configure sudo, to reflect the privileged command access requirements of all users of the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_enableRbac
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.13.2 and AIX7.1-4.14.2 (Level 2): Enable RBAC by creating so, sa, and isso users with appropriate roles.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.15.1 and AIX7.1-4.15.1 (Level 2): Maintaining the system integrity by detecting, removing and protecting against known types of malicious software.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_filepermgr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.16.1 and AIX7.1-4.16.1 (Level 2): Remove suid and sgid permissions should be removed where possible.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstalluucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX6.1-2.12.18 and AIX7.1-4.12.18 (Level 1): Local Accounts: Remove user account uucp.
